Uses of Interface
net.xqhs.flash.core.Entity.EntityProxy

  • Packages that use Entity.EntityProxy 
    Package Description
    example.echoAgent
    A simple deployment, testing the deployment of very basic scenarios.
    example.simplePingPong
    The scenario of two agents which ping messages between them (one sends and one replies).
    example.webSocketsDeployment
    Verifies: correct functioning of the websockets support infrastructure, in three different loading contexts (manual deployment, with deployment configuration and simple agents, and with deployment configuration and composite agents).
    net.xqhs.flash.core
    The package contains the core of Flash-MAS.
    net.xqhs.flash.core.composite
    The package contains classes related to the implementation ofCompositeAgent.
    net.xqhs.flash.core.monitoring  
    net.xqhs.flash.core.node
    The package contains classes needed for easily deploying Flash agents.
    net.xqhs.flash.core.shard
    The package contains interfaces and abstract classes for core agent features.
    net.xqhs.flash.core.support
    Core classes dealing with support items, such as communication and mobility.
    net.xqhs.flash.local
    Package that offers support for local communication.
    net.xqhs.flash.webSocket

    • Uses of Entity.EntityProxy in net.xqhs.flash.core

      Methods in net.xqhs.flash.core that return Entity.EntityProxy 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      <C extends Entity<P>>
      Entity.EntityProxy<C>      		 Entity.asContext()
      Returns a proxy to this entity.
      Methods in net.xqhs.flash.core with parameters of type Entity.EntityProxy 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean Entity.addContext​(Entity.EntityProxy<P> context)
      Creates a link from a subordinate entity to an entity containing it in some way.
      boolean Entity.addGeneralContext​(Entity.EntityProxy<? extends Entity<?>> context)
      Creates a link from a subordinate entity to an entity containing it in some way.
      boolean Entity.removeContext​(Entity.EntityProxy<P> context)
      Removes the link from a subordinate entity to an entity containing it in some way.
      boolean Entity.removeGeneralContext​(Entity.EntityProxy<? extends Entity<?>> context)
      Removes the from a subordinate entity to the specified context.
      Method parameters in net.xqhs.flash.core with type arguments of type Entity.EntityProxy 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      T Loader.load​(MultiTreeMap configuration, java.util.List<Entity.EntityProxy<? extends Entity<?>>> context, java.util.List<MultiTreeMap> subordinateEntities)
      Loads a new instance of entity T and provides it with the given context, as well as with a flat (as opposed to the hierarchical structure provided by the configuration) list of entities that should be present in the context of this entity.
      Entity<?> Loader.SimpleLoader.load​(MultiTreeMap configuration, java.util.List<Entity.EntityProxy<? extends Entity<?>>> context, java.util.List<MultiTreeMap> subordinateEntities)
      The method will attempt to instantiate a new entity, using the classpath from the "classpath" parameter in the configuration (as a simple key).
      boolean Loader.preload​(MultiTreeMap configuration, java.util.List<Entity.EntityProxy<? extends Entity<?>>> context)
      Same as Loader.preload(MultiTreeMap), but performs the checks in the given context.
      boolean Loader.SimpleLoader.preload​(MultiTreeMap configuration, java.util.List<Entity.EntityProxy<? extends Entity<?>>> context)
      Context is not considered in any way.

      protected java.util.ArrayList<Entity.EntityProxy<? extends Entity<?>>> CompositeAgent.agentContext

      Methods in net.xqhs.flash.core.composite with parameters of type Entity.EntityProxy 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean CompositeAgent.addContext​(Entity.EntityProxy<Pylon> context)
      Context can be added to an agent only when it is not running.
      boolean CompositeAgent.addGeneralContext​(Entity.EntityProxy<? extends Entity<?>> context)  
      boolean CompositeAgent.removeContext​(Entity.EntityProxy<Pylon> context)
      Context can be removed from an agent only when it is not running.
      boolean CompositeAgent.removeGeneralContext​(Entity.EntityProxy<? extends Entity<?>> context)  
      Method parameters in net.xqhs.flash.core.composite with type arguments of type Entity.EntityProxy 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Agent CompositeAgentLoader.load​(MultiTreeMap agentConfiguration, java.util.List<Entity.EntityProxy<? extends Entity<?>>> context, java.util.List<MultiTreeMap> subordinateEntities)
      The method loads all the information necessary for the creation of an agent and returns an Agent instance used to manage the life-cycle of the loaded agent.
      boolean CompositeAgentLoader.preload​(MultiTreeMap agentConfiguration, java.util.List<Entity.EntityProxy<? extends Entity<?>>> context)
      The method checks potential problems that could appear in the creation of an agent, as specified by the information in the argument.

    • Uses of Entity.EntityProxy in net.xqhs.flash.core.support

      Subinterfaces of Entity.EntityProxy in net.xqhs.flash.core.support 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      interface  MessagingPylonProxy
      This interface should be implemented by any proxy to a Pylon that offers messaging services.
      interface  PylonProxy
      Entity.EntityProxy for a Pylon, specifying the only one required method, for retrieving the recommended implementation for shards connecting to the pylon.
